description:
Meet the enthusiastic customers of the bookstore who bring excitement and stimulation to Honda-san’s job.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otsugi de Omachi no Okyaku-sama ga Ikemen / Yaoi Girls from Overseas!!!
The Handsome Guy Is First in Line / Yaoi Girls from Overseas!!!
